item.description:
POSTPONED * POSTPONED * POSTPONED

[Bad weather forecast - will reschedule for another date]


Is anyone interested in taking a trip to Mars, the Moon,
Saturn and the Orion Nebula on Tues Feb 23?
If we get a quorum and it stays clear, I'll be giving a tour of the Harvard Observatory telescopes.

If the weather isn't good on Feb 23 we'll keep trying
each night till there's a good night, with updates each day here and at
http://www.planet4589...

Details: 9 pm,
60 Garden St, Cambridge
near intersection of Garden and Linnean
Building B entrance
Map at http://www.planet4589...

Call Jonathan at 617-447-9618 to confirm if weather is marginal
item.name: Atheists and the heavens
